page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA
page.content: This area is situated on the{Sussex {coastal plain.}To the north is the start of the Downs.The area is very flat, rising no more than 10metres above sea level.The land to the west of the block, around {Aldingbourne {Rife}has been drained and provides mainly pasture.The central area is either arable land or for {market {gardening}. The eastern side is mainly {housing}.Westergate is part of a ribbon development that joins up with Eastergate,Barnham,Yapton and Aldingbourne to form the "5 villages".In recent years every piece of land along the main roads has been built upon with houses.{Local {employment}is in market gardening and farming, the majority of people work outside the area.The only other two things of note are the "Rock factory"and Fontwell Racecourse.
